title: Bidpool.xyz - NFT Governance Tokens
description: There is no service enabling multiple parties to jointly buy/own NFTs. Current options are expensive, complex, and lack a governance system.
solution: Build a tool to enable trustless parties to jointly own NFTs while leveraging the governance features of Cardano native assets. DAO per NFT.
experience: An NFT collector, an all-purpose dev, and an economist walk into a bar... we don't really know the punchline here but maybe one of you will.
